title: Dev Proposal. Toxic Que!!!!!!
body:
Give us a new ranked que mode for 5v5 ranked in summoners rift. All offensive speech is allowed. No chat bans. No bans for anything other than afk or inting.

As long as a player tries to win let then talk as much $&!+ As they want. 

Make it like the old que system to keep que times down. Don't let people que for roles. Let us fight it out in champ select for roles. 

LET'S GOOOOOO!!!!!

replies.body: I'm guessing the OP wants a mode to play in where he cant get banned...

And you think getting punished for responding to entire teams of 0/10 int feeders and smurfs is healthy for the game, even now when that's about 2 in 3 games?

Even the devs responsible for punishment have said they've learned that their old IFS stipulations were catching and responding excessively.

The game itself is toxic right now. And you don't expect players to be?

> [{quoted}](name=Illabethe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ha40IHRF,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-08-12T02:13:57.398+0000)
>
> And you think getting punished for responding to entire teams of 0/10 int feeders and smurfs is healthy for the game, even now when that's about 2 in 3 games?
> 
> Even the devs responsible for punishment have said they've learned that their old IFS stipulations were catching and responding excessively.
> 
> The game itself is toxic right now. And you don't expect players to be?

i play unranked so i can easily just laugh at them being stupid.

there is no way to not get angry over a group of idiots in your ranked game. 
the matchmaking system is such crap..

but in unranked..  i can laugh at them without a care in the world as if they throw... oh well we lost... who cares..

and if i hardcarry thier ass while not insulting them. thats a win in and of itself.

if u cant handel how aweful ranked is... dont play it...

thats what i decided to do.. it makes league much more fun.. nto havign to worry abot that kind of thing.

its a lot more fun to play a game if nothing is on the line.

Fair enough. But it needs addressed for Rank's sake. That's where the vast majority of active players try to be, and the longer the "game" is toxic, the more the players are, the more they get removed from the game, lose interest because they can't earn honor rewards or victorious skins..... The faster the player base is going to dwindle.

I don't care so much about people leaving for natural game reasons..... but entirely preventable ones are another thing entirely.

I guess it comes down to:
Does Riot lose more players due to balance patches which unleash unpredictable and overwhelming changes, or do they lose more players from player toxicity, or from Riot not behaving the way players expect them to.

I'm willing to bet more leave due to Balance issues than anything, exacerbated by the fear they if they play 1-2 more months, they are going to get a perma ban because they react to those Balance issues/players who feed because of them.

Toxic players only enjoy being toxic when other people dont do it to them in return.

Plus there is no chance of this happening, it would be moronic.

Not many actually enjoy being toxic. But it's the natural reaction to teammates making games unwinnable, and then .... even if you say nothing at all...... having the gall to try to surrender at 15, after they themselves spoiled the game.

So you want a queue that encourages flame? I think it's a poor idea, I mean, who would choose to queue specifically to get flamed? Are you (not you in particular) that toxic that you need a queue made specifically designed for you to not have to watch your behavior? If you're that toxic then you aren't worth the dev's time and energy to cater to you.
Yes. This is exactly what I want. Let the flamers okay together and punish more harshly in normal que.
